info.name: GCA Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for GCA Backend - SuperAdmin, Admin, and User Management System with Team Management, Team Member Management, Judge Management, Event Management, Event Sponsor Management, Preference Management, and Payment APIs. Updated with country flag upload functionality, comprehensive preference system for Individual, Association, and Enterprise users, individual user filtering by association ID with pagination and search capabilities, and event sponsor management with S3 image uploads for banners and logos.

response.name: Success Response
Success Response
Error Response - Judge Not Found
Success Response
Error Response - Judge Not Found
Error Response - Invalid Status

query.description: Event ID to filter teams by

request.description: Get all teams associated with a specific event. Returns team details including team lead info and member count.
Update team status. Valid statuses: review, doc_approved, doc_rejected, pre_qualification_review, prequalification_approve

item.name: Get Individual Users by Association ID (Admin)

query.description: Association ID to filter users by
Page number for pagination (default: 1)
Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
Search term to filter by name or email (optional)

query.description: Search term to find enterprise users. Searches across: enterprise name, contact person email, industry, and contact person name. Optional parameter - if not provided, returns all enterprise users (limited to 10).

request.description: Search and retrieve enterprise users based on multiple criteria. Searches across enterprise name, contact person email, industry, and contact person name. Returns up to 10 most relevant results sorted by creation date (newest first). The search is case-insensitive and supports partial matches.

formdata.description: KYC Document file (PDF, Image, Word, Excel) - Max 10MB (optional)

request.description: Update Individual User KYC information with optional document upload. The kyc_doc field accepts files up to 10MB in size. Supported file types: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, PDF, Word documents, Excel files.

response.name: Success Response with Document Upload

query.description: Event ID (required)
Judge ID (required)

request.description: Get judging round status with judge-specific progress tracking. Returns current round, timing, and personal submission data for the specific judge.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,

  "teamId": "{{teamId}}",
  "message": "Hello everyone! This is a group message.",
  "messageType": "text",
  "attachment": null,
  "replyTo": null,
  "senderType": "team_member",
  "senderName": "John Doe",
  "senderRole": "Team Lead"
}

  "teamId": "{{teamId}}",
